docs.text: Name Start Packet Description Used to connect the client to the game. Sent after Login button is pressed Raw Packet 42["signIn",{"name":"waftest"}] JSON [ "signIn" , { "name" : "TheWaffle" } ] JSON Definition Main Object Key Type Example Description name String TheWaffle Client Username

Task ID ... ? ? Additional Data

docs.text: Name Hack Player Task Description Used to start hacking a player. Sent after the Hack button is pressed on a Player Raw Packet 42["playerRequest",{"task":100,"id":18,"port":2}] JSON [ "playerRequest" , { "task" : 100 , "id" : 18 , "port" : 2 } ] JSON Definition Main Object Key Type Example Description task Number 100 Task ID id Number/String 18 Target Player ID Type is a Number if the Player is a Bot otherwise a String port Number 2 Port ID 0 = A, 1 = B, 2 = C
Hack Player Task
docs.title: Name

docs.text: Used to start hacking a player. Sent after the Hack button is pressed on a Player
docs.title: Description

docs.text: 42["playerRequest",{"task":100,"id":18,"port":2}]
docs.title: Raw Packet

docs.text: [ "playerRequest" , { "task" : 100 , "id" : 18 , "port" : 2 } ]
docs.title: JSON

docs.text: Key Type Example Description task Number 100 Task ID id Number/String 18 Target Player ID Type is a Number if the Player is a Bot otherwise a String port Number 2 Port ID 0 = A, 1 = B, 2 = C
docs.title: Main Object

docs.text: Name Buy Computer Upgrade Task Description Used to buy a Computer Upgrade Sent after a Computer Upgrade is pressed on Raw Packet 42["playerRequest",{"task":102,"id":2,"fid":1}] JSON [ "playerRequest" , { "task" : 102 , "id" : 2 , "fid" : 1 } ] JSON Definition Main Object Key Type Example Description task Number 102 Task ID id Number 2 Upgrade ID 0 = Charge x 5 1 = Max Charge + 5 2 = Upgrade Strength 3 = Increase Regen fid Number 1 Firewall ID 0 = A, 1 = B, 2 = C

docs.title: JSON

docs.text: Key Type Example Description task Number 102 Task ID id Number 2 Upgrade ID 0 = Charge x 5 1 = Max Charge + 5 2 = Upgrade Strength 3 = Increase Regen fid Number 1 Firewall ID 0 = A, 1 = B, 2 = C

docs.text: Name Buy Data Miner Task Description Used to buy a Data Miner Sent after a Data Miner is pressed on in the Black Market Raw Packet 42["playerRequest",{"task":103,"id":0}] JSON [ "playerRequest" , { "task" : 103 , "id" : 0 , } ] JSON Definition Main Object Key Type Example Description task Number 102 Task ID id Number 0 Data Miner ID Data Miner ID Name Production Rate Original Cost 0 Data Miner 0.0002 0.06 1 Advanced Miner 0.0075 0.25 2 Mining Drill 0.0390 18.4 3 Data Center 1.0700 512 4 Bot Net 6.4000 3072 5 Quantum Server 53.330 25600

docs.text: Name Hacking Client Start Task Description Used to tell the Client of an incoming Hack Sent when the Client is being hacked Raw Packet 42["mainPackage",{"unique":[{"task":2000,"data":{"type":0,"id":"pcJrcE0MStEWlpHCAAMa","name":"el hackos","port":0}}]}] JSON [ "mainPackage" , { "unique" : [ { "task" : 2000 , "data" : { "type" : 0 , "id" : "pcJrcE0MStEWlpHCAAMa" , "name" : "el hackos" , "port" : 0 } } ] } ] JSON Definition Task Object Key Type Example Description task Number 2000 Task ID data Object {...} Data Object Data Object Key Type Example Description type Number 0 Message Type Always set to 0 id Number/String pcJrcE0MStEWlpHCAAMa Player ID Type is a Number if the Player is a Bot otherwise a String name String el hackos Player Username port Number 0 Port ID 0 = A, 1 = B, 2 = C

docs.text:
Name Show Message Task Description Used to show the client a Message Sent after successfully Hacking a Player Raw Packet 42["mainPackage",{"unique":[{"task":2003,"text":"
Hacking successful. Reward: 0.237 BT

Select a new Port.","action":0,"extra":{"overlay":{"value":0.237}}}]}] JSON [ "mainPackage" , { "unique" : [ { "task" : 2003 , "text" : "
Hacking successful. Reward: 0.237 BT

Select a new Port." , "action" : 0 , "extra" : { "overlay" : { "value" : 0.237 } } } ] } ] JSON Definition Task Object Key Type Example Description task Number 2003 Task ID text String
Hacking successful. Reward: 0.237 BT

Select a new Port. Message Action Number 0 Action Set to reset Typing Word image to blank extra Object {...} Overlay Object Set to add to Log Overlay Object Key Type Example Description value Number 0.237 Hacked BTC
Show Message Task
docs.title: Name

docs.text: Used to show the client a Message Sent after successfully Hacking a Player
docs.title: Description

docs.text:
42["mainPackage",{"unique":[{"task":2003,"text":"
Hacking successful. Reward: 0.237 BT

Select a new Port.","action":0,"extra":{"overlay":{"value":0.237}}}]}]
docs.title: Raw Packet

docs.text:
[ "mainPackage" , { "unique" : [ { "task" : 2003 , "text" : "
Hacking successful. Reward: 0.237 BT

Select a new Port." , "action" : 0 , "extra" : { "overlay" : { "value" : 0.237 } } } ] } ]
docs.title: JSON

docs.text:
Key Type Example Description task Number 2003 Task ID text String
Hacking successful. Reward: 0.237 BT

Select a new Port. Message Action Number 0 Action Set to reset Typing Word image to blank extra Object {...} Overlay Object Set to add to Log

docs.text: Key Type Example Description value Number 0.237 Hacked BTC
docs.title: Overlay Object

docs.text: Name Hacking Player Charges Update Task Description Used to update the charges of the Player being Hacked Sent after successful Client Task 777 Raw Packet 42["mainPackage",{"unique":[{"task":2004,"state":{"charges":1,"max_charges":14}}]}] JSON [ "mainPackage" , { "unique" : [ { "task" : 2004 , "state" : { "charges" : 1 , "max_charges" : 14 } } ] } ] JSON Definition Task Object Key Type Example Description task Number 2004 Task ID state Object {...} State Object State Object Key Type Example Description charges Number 1 Current Charges max_charges Number 14 Max Charges

docs.text: Name Hacking Client Finish Task Description Used to tell the Client of a Hack finishing Sent when the Client has finished being hacked Raw Packet 42["mainPackage",{"unique":[{"task":2005,"data":{"port":0,"hacked":false}}]}] JSON [ "mainPackage" , { "unique" : [ { "task" : 2005 , "data" : { "port" : 0 , "hacked" : false } } ] } ] JSON Definition Task Object Key Type Example Description task Number 2005 Task ID data Object {...} Data Object Data Object Key Type Example Description port Number 0 Port ID 0 = A, 1 = B, 2 = C hacked Boolean false Hack Successful?

docs.text: Name Chat Message Task Description Used to tell the Client of a Chat Message Sent when the Client recieves a Chat Message Raw Packet 42["mainPackage",{"unique":[{"task":2006,"id":"tvwnXgx_Wl621AU9AALl","name":"Korean","message":"hello again"}]}] JSON [ "mainPackage" , { "unique" : [ { "task" : 2006 , "id" : "tvwnXgx_Wl621AU9AALl" , "name" : "Korean" , "message" : "hello again" } ] } ] JSON Definition Task Object Key Type Example Description task Number 2006 Task ID id String tvwnXgx_Wl621AU9AALl Player ID Type is a Number if the Player is a Bot otherwise a String name String Korean Player Username message String hello again Message

docs.text: Name Open Target Info Task Description Used to open Target Info window Sent after Client Task 105 Raw Packet 42["mainPackage",{"unique":[{"task":2007,"data":{"id":"WoJViuKP_sa0ii_rAALP","name":"саша","level":1,"desc":"no description","comm":{"first":"Лох","second":"66lcf"},"achievmentRank":0,"country":"kp"}}]}] JSON [ "mainPackage" , { "unique" : [ { "task" : 2007 , "data" : { "id" : "WoJViuKP_sa0ii_rAALP" , "name" : "саша" , "level" : 1 , "desc" : "no description" , "comm" : { "first" : "Лох" , "second" : "66lcf" }, "achievmentRank" : 0 , "country:" : "kp" } } ] } ] JSON Definition Task Object Key Type Example Description task Number 2007 Task ID data Object {...} Data Object Data Object Key Type Example Description id Number/String WoJViuKP_sa0ii_rAALP Player ID Type is a Number if the Player is a Bot otherwise a String name String саша Player Username level Number 1 Player Level desc String no description Player Description comm Object {...} Hacked Message's Object achievmentRank Number 0 Achievement Rank's country String kp Country Hacked Message's Object Key Type Example Description first String Лох First Hacked Message second String 66lcf Second Hacked Message Achievement Rank's ID Level Name 0 1 Bronze 1 10 Silver 2 30 Gold 3 100 Platinum 4 250 Diamond 5 500 Master

docs.text: Name Target List Update Task Description Used to update the Target List Sent every 4 seconds Raw Packet 42["mainPackage",{"unique":[{"task":2008,"data":[{"id":"vFKZOe18cFv1dWshAAPM","name":"Fuckmesenpai","level":3,"desc":"Don't leave before I finish","comm":{"first":".........","second":"........."},"rank":34,"achievmentRank":0,"country":"kp"},...],"topFive":[{"id":"jl1gqI8c0eAELrTuAAGD","name":"👽","level":570,"desc":"no description","comm":{"first":"GG","second":"GG"},"rank":1,"achievmentRank":5,"country":"kp"},...]}]}] JSON [ "mainPackage" , { "unique" : [ { "task" : 2008 , "data" : [ { "achievmentRank" : 0 , "comm" : { "first" : "........." , "second" : "........." }, "country" : "kp" , "desc" : "Don't leave before I finish" , "id" : "vFKZOe18cFv1dWshAAPM" , "level" : 3 , "name" : "Fuckmesenpai" , "rank" : 34 }, ... ], "topFive" : [ { "achievmentRank" : 5 , "comm" : { "first" : "GG" , "second" : "GG" }, "country" : "kp" , "desc" : "no description" , "id" : "jl1gqI8c0eAELrTuAAGD" , "level" : 570 , "name" : "👽" , "rank" : 1 , }, ... ] } ] } ] JSON Definition Note topFive Array only contains the Top 3 Player's Task Object Key Type Example Description task Number 2008 Task ID data Object {...} Data Object topFive Object {...] TopFive Object Data/TopFive Object Key Type Example Description achievmentRank Number 0 Achievement Rank ID comm Object {...} Hacked Message's Object country String kp Country desc String Don't leave before I finish" Player Description id Number/String vFKZOe18cFv1dWshAAPM Player ID Type is a Number if the Player is a Bot otherwise a String level Number 3 Player Level name String Fuckmesenpai Player Username rank Number 34 Rank Hacked Message's Object Key Type Example Description first String Лох First Hacked Message second String 66lcf Second Hacked Message Achievement Rank's ID Level Name 0 1 Bronze 1 10 Silver 2 30 Gold 3 100 Platinum 4 250 Diamond 5 500 Master
Target List Update Task
docs.title: Name

docs.text: Used to update the Target List Sent every 4 seconds
docs.title: Description

docs.text: 42["mainPackage",{"unique":[{"task":2008,"data":[{"id":"vFKZOe18cFv1dWshAAPM","name":"Fuckmesenpai","level":3,"desc":"Don't leave before I finish","comm":{"first":".........","second":"........."},"rank":34,"achievmentRank":0,"country":"kp"},...],"topFive":[{"id":"jl1gqI8c0eAELrTuAAGD","name":"👽","level":570,"desc":"no description","comm":{"first":"GG","second":"GG"},"rank":1,"achievmentRank":5,"country":"kp"},...]}]}]
docs.title: Raw Packet

docs.text: [ "mainPackage" , { "unique" : [ { "task" : 2008 , "data" : [ { "achievmentRank" : 0 , "comm" : { "first" : "........." , "second" : "........." }, "country" : "kp" , "desc" : "Don't leave before I finish" , "id" : "vFKZOe18cFv1dWshAAPM" , "level" : 3 , "name" : "Fuckmesenpai" , "rank" : 34 }, ... ], "topFive" : [ { "achievmentRank" : 5 , "comm" : { "first" : "GG" , "second" : "GG" }, "country" : "kp" , "desc" : "no description" , "id" : "jl1gqI8c0eAELrTuAAGD" , "level" : 570 , "name" : "👽" , "rank" : 1 , }, ... ] } ] } ]
docs.title: JSON

docs.text: Note topFive Array only contains the Top 3 Player's

rate Number {...} Value Increase / Second Note The Data Object contains 3 Firewall Object's for each Port Firewall Object Key Type Example Description charges Number 1 Current Charges max_charges Number 10 Maximum Charges strength Number 0 Strength regeneration Number 0 Regeneration nextRegenIn Number 120 Time Until next Regeneration in seconds charge_cool Number 0 Charge x 5 Purchase Cooldown in seconds recoveryIn Number 30 Time Until next Recovery in seconds is_hacked Boolean false Is Hacked? upgrades Object {...} Firewall Upgrades Object Note The s_cost value is not sent for Upgrade ID == 0 Firewall Upgrades Object Key Type Example Description (index) Number 0 Upgrade ID 0 = Charge x 5 1 = Max Charge + 5 2 = Increase Strength 3 = Increase Regen f_cost Number 0.5 Current Price s_cost Number 0.5 Original Price Note The Data Object contains 6 Market Object's for each Data Miner Market Object Key Type Example Description (index) Number 0 Data Miner ID Amount Number 1 Amount rate docs.text: Name Hacking Word Response Task Description Used to respond to Client Task 777 Sent after Client Task 777 Raw Packet 42["mainPackage",{"unique":[{"task":333,"opt":1,"url":{"t":"m","i":62}}]}] JSON [ "mainPackage" , { "unique" : [ { "task" : 333 , "opt" : 1 , "url" : { "t" : "m" , "i" : 62 } } ] } ] JSON Definition Task Object Key Type Example Description task Number 333 Task ID opt Number 1 Option Option 0: Incorrect Word Option 1: New Word Option 2: Correct Word url Object {...} URL Object Only set if Option == 1 Note The Full URL used to fetch the images is construted this way: http://s0urce.io/client/img/word/:difficulty/:index URL Object Key Type Example Description t String m Difficulty e = Easy, m = Medium, h = Hard i Number 62 Index
